website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot G9 X is the smallest camera you can get with a 1-inch image sensor, but it has a limited zoom range and is very slow when shooting in Raw format.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. The ease of use and the quality of the images taken is superb.
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: The camera came without a cable to connect to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera came without a cable to connect to the computor.The cable I had used with my three previous Canons would not connect with the G9 X. A cable I then ordered from Canons did not work and my IT advisor found it was not compatable with Windows XP which I use. The only way then I can transfer from this camera to computor is via a card reader. Very inconvenient. None of this was explained in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: frank cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant photos, battery life not brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant photos, battery life not brilliant. Easily pocketable which means taking high quality photos on the move a real possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Well featured compact camera which produces excellent photos. Does take a little while to learn the menus but there is a customisation option. I initially missed having a viewfinder but have now become accustomed to using the screen. For me it's a good easy to use and flexible camera to take on holiday or when going out for a walk, etc.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it and I realise it can do lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and I realise it can do lots of things my last camera could not do, but it is small, my eyesight isn't good, my brain is old and it will take a few weeks of practice to realise its potential! (I will then probably award it 5 stars).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera takes some getting used to but has some great modes. The only negative I have to say ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite ordering this product as a prime customer it took over 2 days to be delivered. Unfortunately as a result of this I wasnt able to take it on holiday with me. Bought the same camera at the airport for the same price as I paid for it here. Camera takes some getting used to but has some great modes. The only negative I have to say about it is that if the battery dies on you, all pictures are deleted on the memory card. This was to my lesson as I lost the first 4 days of a 2 week trip to Sri Lanka.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera but fiddly compared to Canon S95 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact camera but fiddly compared to Canon S95 and S120 Not much better except for video and low light
customer_reviews.author: iP4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous camera that takes beautiful photos. I agonised about buying one when my iPhone is always with me but I am delighted with it. Great low light photos, brilliant flash performance that looks natural. I attended my brother's 50th birthday dinner and had the only non-phone camera. He was very happy with the results. Now I need to make time for reading the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, excellent images
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. Genuinely compact and lightweight unlike other models and brands with a 1" sensor. Allows people who don't want a bulky heavy camera or a brick in their pocket to get good quality images. Canon hit the mark with this camera. Needs a better macro mode though, 5cm not close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: Another evolution in the small Canon camera range. This is my third ixus over ten years and it's clear that improvements have been made to picture quality and screen. The engine inside is the same as last year's G7X but in a smaller more convenient body. The pictures come out well in auto. The manual mode is quite complex so I haven't really bothered but this is the best pocked sized camera out there - great for snaps on the fly!
customer_reviews.author: The Goat

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot G9 X Compact System Camera - Black (20.9 MP, Wi-Fi, NFC) 3-Inch Touch Screen
product_meta.description:
Expert quality in a camera you will hardly notice is there. Slim and beautifully crafted, with as much or as little control as you like, it puts simple creative expression and premium quality results in the palm of your hand.

BOX CONTAINS
1x Digital Camera PowerShotG9 
1x Wrist Strap WS-DC12 
1x Battery Pack NB-13L 
1x Battery Charger CB-2LHEAC cable 
1x User manual Kit
feature_bullets: A beautifully slim and portable camera with a bright lens, large sensor and powerful processor to capture premium quality photos and movies with ease
Wi-Fi with NFC and Image Sync make it simple to connect to your smart device, capture shots remotely and then share or back up your creations
Embrace spontaneity with superfast autofocus plus 6.0 fps continuous shooting and enjoy effortless creative modes with professional style results
Capture stunning 60p Full HD movies with creative control of aperture, shutter speed and ISO plus Advanced Dynamic IS for steady footage
Enjoy simple creative control with intuitive touchscreen operation and features like aLens Control Ring and in-built ND filter with Auto mode.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars13 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
